channel.title: customer service on Conor's Bandon Blog
channel.description: Recent content in customer service on Conor's Bandon Blog

item.title: Pineberry Pi and Fedex trying to rip me off for import duties on an intra-EU delivery
item.description: I have a series of long-overdue customer support horror stories to write about, but this one really has me enraged. TL;DR I ordered something from Pineberry Pi in Poland. It shipped to Ireland. Fedex insists I need to pay import duties. Pineberry Pi is acting like it’s not their problem. Avoid doing business with all these people. I’ve been shopping online since 1997. I’ve been shopping from EU sites using the Euro since 2002ish.
